languages.text: "Судя по тому, как о {mf|нем|ней} говорил встречающий — кто-то крайне важный. Я, однако, впервые слышу это имя".
"Judging by the way that fellow with the list was talking about this individual — it's someone very important. But it's not a name I've heard before."
languages.original_text: "Судя по тому, как о {mf|нем|ней} говорил встречающий — кто-то крайне важный. Я, однако, впервые слышу это имя".

traits.locale_text: "Judging by the way that gatekeeper was talking about {mf|him|her} — it's someone very important. But this is the first time I'm hearing this name."
"Judging by the way that gatekeeper was talking about {mf|him|her} — it's someone very important. But this is the first time I'm hearing this name."
"Judging by the way that fellow with the list was talking about {mf|him|her} — it's someone very important. But it's not a name I've heard before."
"Judging by the way that fellow with the list was talking about {mf|him|her} — it's someone very important. But it's not a name I've heard before."
"Judging by the way that fellow with the list was talking about {mf|him|her} — it's someone very important. But it's not a name I've heard before."

languages.text: “从那个拿着名单的人谈论这个人的语气来看，这个人肯定非常重要，但我之前从来没听说过这个名字。”
languages.original_text: "Judging by the way that fellow with the list was talking about this individual — it's someone very important. But it's not a name I've heard before."

traits.locale_text: “从那个拿着名单的人谈论这个人的语气来看，这个人肯定非常重要，但我之前从来没听说过这个名字。”

languages.text: «A juzgar por el tono del hombre de la lista, es evidente que se trata de alguien importante, pero es la primera vez que oigo ese nombre».
languages.original_text: "Judging by the way that fellow with the list was talking about this individual — it's someone very important. But it's not a name I've heard before."

traits.locale_text: «A juzgar por el tono del hombre de la lista, es evidente que se trata de alguien importante, pero es la primera vez que oigo ese nombre».

languages.text: 「リストを持っている男が例の個人に対する話し方から察するに、かなりの重要人物のようです。しかし、そのような名前は我も聞いたことがありません」
languages.original_text: "Judging by the way that fellow with the list was talking about this individual — it's someone very important. But it's not a name I've heard before."

traits.locale_text: 「リストを持っている男が例の個人に対する話し方から察するに、かなりの重要人物のようです。しかし、そのような名前は我も聞いたことがありません」

languages.text: "So wie der Mann mit der Liste von diesem Individuum gesprochen hat ... muss es eine recht wichtige Person sein. Aber ich habe den Namen noch nie gehört."
languages.original_text: "Judging by the way that fellow with the list was talking about this individual — it's someone very important. But it's not a name I've heard before."

traits.locale_text: "So wie der Mann mit der Liste von {mf|ihm|ihr} gesprochen hat, muss es eine sehr wichtige Person sein. Aber ich habe den Namen noch nie gehört."

languages.text: « Vu la façon dont l'homme à la liste en parlait, c'est quelqu'un de très important, mais je n'avais encore jamais entendu ce nom. »
languages.original_text: "Judging by the way that fellow with the list was talking about this individual — it's someone very important. But it's not a name I've heard before."

traits.locale_text: « Vu la façon dont l'homme à la liste en parlait, c'est quelqu'un de très important, mais je n'avais encore jamais entendu ce nom. »

languages.text: "Listeli adamın ondan bahsetme şekline bakarsak pek muhim bir şahsiyet olmalı. Gelgelelim adını ilk kez duyuyorum."
languages.original_text: "Judging by the way that fellow with the list was talking about this individual — it's someone very important. But it's not a name I've heard before."

traits.locale_text: "Listeli adamın ondan bahsetme şekline bakarsak pek muhim bir şahsiyet olmalı. Gelgelelim adını ilk kez duyuyorum."
